prompt: What is the AI app that changes the language of videos?

hidden_queries: AI app that changes the language of videos
app that automatically translates and dubs videos with AI
metadata.generated_search_query: AI app that changes the language of videos

sources.title: AiDub: AI Video Translator - Apps on Google Play
sources.snippet: AiDub is an AI video dubbing and translator app that helps you translate videos, dub videos, and generate AI voiceovers in more than 40 languages. This AI-powered dubbing tool lets you translate audio, add voice dubbing, and create lip-synced video translations for social media or personal content.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are some AI apps/tools that change the language of videos (translate + dub with AI voices): Mobile / Standalone Apps AiDub – AI video translator with dubbed voiceovers and lip sync for 40+ languages on Android. Google Play
Panini Translate AI – Android app that translates and dubs videos into 75+ languages with voice cloning. AI Video Translation and Dubbing App
Dub AI – iOS app for AI video/audio translation with lip-sync dubbing. App Store

sources.title: AI Video Translator with Voice Cloning & Lip Sync | Free Trial
sources.snippet: Upload a video file, translate into 125+ languages with AI voices, auto subtitles, voice cloning and lip sync. Free trial, no account needed!

citation_mappings.claim_text: Online AI Video Translators Maestra.ai – Web tool to translate and dub videos into 125+ languages with AI voices. Maestra AI
Vozo.ai – AI video translator with dubbing and customizable subtitles in 110+ languages. Vozo
DubPilot AI – Online translator/dubber supporting 100+ languages and natural voiceovers. DubPilot AI
Dubverse – AI video translator with subtitles and voiceovers for ~60+ languages. Dubverse.ai
CapCut AI Video Translator – Built-in feature in CapCut that auto-translates and dubs languages. CapCut
Wavel.ai – Online translator that adds AI subtitles and dubbed audio in 100+ languages. Wavel

citation_mappings.claim_text: Quick summary: Apps (iOS/Android): AiDub, Panini Translate AI, Dub AI. Web/Online tools: Maestra, Vozo, DubPilot AI, Dubverse, CapCut AI Translator, Wavel. Each lets you convert spoken language in a video to another language with AI-generated voiceovers and often synced lip movement, without manual recording. Maestra AI+1
